price: ߊ߬ ߝߐ߫ ߞߏ߫ ߒ ߡߊ߰ߙߌ ߸ ߌ ߦߋ߫ ߞߏ߫ ߦߌ߬ߘߊ߬ ߒ ߠߊ߫ ߏ ߕߎ߬ߡߊ ߞߐ߲߬ߞߐ߲߬ ߞߍߣߴߊ߬ߟߎ߫ ߡߊ߬ ߡߍ߲ ߘߐ߫
arabic: قُل رَّبِّ إِمَّا تُرِيَنِّي مَا يُوعَدُونَ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: qul rabbi immā turiyannī mā yūʿadūna
